mapper.insert:
insert into TD_M_CARD_TYPE
CARD_TYPE_CODE,
MERCHANT_ID,
STATE,
CARD_TYPE_NAME,
#{cardTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cardTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT ct.CARD_TYPE_CODE, ct.CARD_TYPE_NAME, ct.MERCHANT_ID, ct.STATE, IFNULL(t.CARD_NUMBER, 0) CARD_NUMBER, CASE ct.STATE WHEN '0' THEN '失效' ELSE '有效' END STATE_NAME FROM td_m_card_type ct LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(mc.CARD_TYPE_CODE) CARD_NUMBER, mc.CARD_TYPE_CODE FROM tf_f_member_card mc GROUP BY mc.CARD_TYPE_CODE) t ON t.CARD_TYPE_CODE = ct.CARD_TYPE_CODE WHERE ct.MERCHANT_ID = #{t.merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
